name: Dylan Dog 11: Il Marchio Rosso
overview: Dylan Dog 11: Il Marchio Rosso is an Action Adventure game, developed and published by Simulmondo, which was released in Europe in 1993. Yuri Wolkoff does not understand why they accuse him of such monstrous crimes. But with his face marked by misery, he is the perfect candidate for everyone: he can only be the killer, the terrible Red Mark. After his death, however, the doubt begins to grow, winds through the fog like a ghost. And a ghost comes back to kill ...
